org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.durable

Interface FactoryLocator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Ancestor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FactoryLocatorImpl

    public interface FactoryLocator
extends Ancestor
    Locates factories by factory name or factory key, where the key is in the form factoryName|bundleName|bundleVersion.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Factory getFactory(java.lang.String _name)
      Returns the requested factory.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.agilewiki.jactor2.util.Ancestor

        getParent

    • Method Detail

      • getFactory

        Factory getFactory(java.lang.String _name)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the requested factory.
        Parameters:
        _name - The factory name or factory key.
        Returns:
        The matching factory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if there is no matching factory.
        java.lang.Exception
